```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
df <- read.csv("./data/youtube_shorts_tiktok_trends_2025.csv")
df_1 <- df %>%
  select(platform, duration_sec, title_length, has_emoji, language, category, upload_hour, is_weekend,
         publish_dayofweek, year_month, creator_avg_views, creator_tier, views, 
         engagement_per_1k, likes, comments, shares, saves, completion_rate)
```

```{r}
write.csv(df_1, "./data/df_1.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
